title: Error in spack spec : not all arguments converted during string formatting
body:
I am not sure if I have specified incompatible options : 

```
$ spack spec coreneuron %cce@8.5.5 ^mod2c target=x86_64
Input spec
--------------------------------
coreneuron%cce@8.5.5
    ^mod2c arch=cray-None-x86_64

Normalized
--------------------------------
coreneuron%cce@8.5.5
    ^cmake@2.8.12:
    ^mod2c arch=cray-None-x86_64

Concretized
--------------------------------
coreneuron@develop%cce@8.5.5~gpu+mpi+neurodamusmod+openmp~profile+report~tests arch=cray-CNL-haswell
    ^cmake@3.0.2%cce@8.5.5~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=cray-CNL-haswell
    ^mod2c@develop%cce@8.5.5 arch=cray-CNL-x86_64
    ^mpich@7.5.0%cce@8.5.5+hydra+pmi+romio~verbs arch=cray-CNL-haswell
    ^neurodamus@develop%cce@8.5.5~compile~profile arch=cray-CNL-haswell
    ^reportinglib@develop%cce@8.5.5~profile+static arch=cray-CNL-haswell

[kumbhar@daint103 ~]$ spack spec coreneuron %cce@8.5.5 ^mod2c target=x86_64 os=sles12
Input spec
--------------------------------
coreneuron%cce@8.5.5
    ^mod2c arch=cray-sles12-x86_64

Normalized
--------------------------------
coreneuron%cce@8.5.5
    ^cmake@2.8.12:
    ^mod2c arch=cray-sles12-x86_64

Concretized
--------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/sources/spack/bin/spack", line 220, in <module>
    main(sys.argv)
  File "/home/sources/spack/bin/spack", line 216, in main
    _main(args, unknown)
  File "/home/sources/spack/bin/spack", line 183, in _main
    return_val = command(parser, args)
  File "/home/sources/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/spec.py", line 88, in spec
    spec.concretize()
  File "/home/sources/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 1678, in concretize
    self._concretize_helper())
  File "/home/sources/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 1519, in _concretize_helper
    name].spec._concretize_helper(presets, visited)
  File "/home/sources/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 1530, in _concretize_helper
    spack.concretizer.concretize_compiler(self),
  File "/home/sources/spack/lib/spack/spack/concretize.py", line 308, in concretize_compiler
    spec.compiler, spec.architecture)
  File "/home/sources/spack/lib/spack/spack/concretize.py", line 425, in _compiler_concretization_failure
    raise UnavailableCompilerVersionError(compiler_spec, arch)
  File "/home/sources/spack/lib/spack/spack/concretize.py", line 457, in __init__
    (compiler_spec, arch.platform_os, arch.target))
TypeError: not all arguments converted during string formatting
```
